sources.title: Broken Armor | Full Faith-Based Drama Movie | Family Faith Movie
sources.description:
Broken Armor | Full Faith-Based Drama Movie | Family Faith Movie

Broken Armor - Tristian's faith is put to the test after his insurance company is unwilling to pay for his daughter's life-threatening surgery. Diverging from his faith to borrow money, his lender orders him to rob a church to test his loyalty.
2021.  Stars: J.G. Turner, Bella Rose, Mike Adams

metadata.Plot: Tristin's daughter, Maggy gets diagnosed with a brain tumor. She needs an immediate operation. The family insurance company will not be able to pay for the operation. The only way for Tristin to pay for the procedure leads down the road with local mobster, Val Drexel. Along the way, Tristin is ordered to rob a church by his new boss, Val. In the wake of the robbery the pastor and the council of the victimized church debate on whether or not to forgive the man responsible, Tristin.
metadata.Actors: J.G. Turner, Bella Rose, Mike Adams
